titleStmt.title: Courant newes out of Italy, Germany, Bohemia, Poland, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: By George Veseler. [sold by P. Keerius],

notesStmt.note: Caption title. Vendor's name and publication date from STC.
Identified as STC 5745 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Bound and filmed with twenty-four other issues.
